trans-unit.source: Represents a control that creates a pop-up window to display information about an element in the Ribbon.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed for the control that is associated with this ToolTip.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The descriptive text to display in the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.Description*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the ToolTip footer for the control that is associated with this ToolTip.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The descriptive text to display in the footer of the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.FooterDescription*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the image that is displayed in the ToolTip footer for the control that is associated with this ToolTip.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The image to display in the footer of the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.FooterImageSource*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the title text that is displayed in the ToolTip footer for the control that is associated with this ToolTip.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The title text to display in the footer of the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.FooterTitle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the ToolTip has content in its footer.

This property returns `true` if any one of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.FooterDescription%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.FooterTitle%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.FooterImageSource%2A> properties has content.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ToolTip has content in its footer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.HasFooter*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip"></xref> has content in its header.

This property returns `true` if any one of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.Description%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.Title%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.ImageSource%2A> properties has content.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ToolTip has content in its header; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.HasHeader*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the image that is displayed for the control that is associated with this ToolTip.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The image to display in the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.ImageSource*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the ToolTip placement target is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ToolTip placement target is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.IsPlacementTargetInRibbonGroup*> dependency property.
To be added.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToolTipAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
This property is set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control and is inherited by the child controls.
It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.Ribbon*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the title text that is displayed for the control that is associated with this ToolTip.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The title text to display in the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.Title*> dependency property.
To be added.
